**Welcome to the scVerse 2024 conference workshop on Data visualization and interactive documentation.**

The content of this workshop can be found in the menu above:

:::{.callout-note icon="false" appearance="simple"}
- slides and references
- rendered notebooks
  - a notebook with various projections and diagnostics
  - a notebook with spatial data and interactive visualizations
- a small guide to publish your own notebooks on github as a webpage
:::
